ThingDef.label: Silk
ThingDef.description: Beautiful and soft silk.

ThingDef.label: Electric Wool
ThingDef.description: Charged wool from a fluffy pokmon. It feels a little strange if you touch it...

ThingDef.label: Tropius Fruit
ThingDef.description: A delicious banana-like fruit from a tropius. It can be eaten by animals and humans.

ThingDef.label: honey
ThingDef.description: Honey from an animal.

ThingDef.label: Pok Puff
ThingDef.description: Pok Puffs are small cake-like confections. All animals can eat it!

RecipeDef.label: make pok puff
RecipeDef.description: Make pok puffs by combining fruits with hay.
